Articles.Content:
So I am attempting to install Simple Construction into my 1.7.3 steam version of KSP

I have SC, have overwritten the Launchpad.dll file with the file from the most recent EPL release. I have installed KPBS as well for my colonization efforts.

The trouble I have run into is that the K&K Workshop (KPBS part) doesn't appear to be syncing properly with EPL/SC as there is a heading on the info tab that says "EL Converter: broken configuration"

Given that I have not learned to code how do I figure out whats broken and fix it?
